org.as2lib.ant
Class Swf.Clip

java.lang.Object
  org.as2lib.ant.Swf.Symbol
      org.as2lib.ant.Swf.Clip
Enclosing class:
Swf
public static class Swf.Clip
extends Swf.Symbol

Clip represents a clip library symbol. This is either a movieclip or a graphic library symbol.

Multiple clips can be declared as follows: 

<clip>
  <include id="simonwacker" import="${file.dir}/simonwacker.jpg"/>
  <include id="martinheidegger" import="${file.dir}/martinheidegger.jpg"/>
</clip>

This task can take the following arguments:

  • id
  • import
  • class or clazz
  • include

Author:
Simon Wacker
